title: Honor System Broken?
body: I've been playing league for what I'd say is a decent amount of time, and i am pretty sure ive been honored atleast once every game ive played, but after playing for months and being level 44. i have not moved past honor level 2. what is wrong{{champion:64}}  im especially getting frustrated because im missing out on the rewards

replies.body:
I wanted to take a look and see what might be holding your progress back, since it does seem like you've been playing a good amount simply from what level you are! It doesn't look like you've been punished for any behavior yet that would have dropped your honor, but it seems like some of the chat logs might have been a little borderline punishable. Instead of punishing you, the system chose to give you a break and kind of stall your honor progress. 

Make sure you're not doing anything that someone could take offense too, and you'll start seeing your honor progress rise soon!

Did you have any punishments that might have put your honor on hold? This could have been just before, or during the new honor system. When you get punished, your honor progress is locked for a while, and punishments could even reduce your honor. Also, your in game behavior will affect your honor, regardless of other people honoring you or not. If you haven't had any punishments and have had an overall good behavior in game, I'm sure someone could look into it for you.
